name: A Song of Earth, Wind, and Fire
name_original: A Song of Earth, Wind, and Fire
description:
Summon your elemental doppelgangers in rhythm to fend off the Void Minions.

CONTROLS

  • Move with the ARROW KEYS
  • Cast your beat-magic in time with the dancing villagers with SPACE

Or

  • Use a MIDI controller to play!

GAMEPLAY

  • Cast on the beat of the element you want two cycles in a row to summon a doppelganger
  • Your doppelgangers will attack the oncoming minions with various levels of damage and effects (slowness, etc.)
  • Regain casting mana when your doppelgangers kill enemies
  • Fight off each wave and destroy the boss to win!
  • Best played with headphones!
